title: I will never apologize for refusing to mute my toxic teammates
body:
You know what's funny? Most of these texts are sarcastic. "ez" is said when they kill us. When I mention ulting because Panth spam ping me cause he died at blue buff all alone I'm still level 3 - 5 holding tower alone.  Jhin leaves lane because I dare try to Soraka E+Q the draven before running off, but he kills me behind tower with his last axe so CLEARLY I'm trolling. Leaves lane and Panth+Jhin flame me ALL game. Is it my fault? Maybe, but me getting punished for something someone else instigated is like getting kids in school trouble for throwing a punch back at a bully who's already given him a bloody lip. So no, I won't apologize. I will get this 10-chat ban off my account by being more anti-toxic than usual, but hell no this ain't my fault. No god-damn way. I will NEVER apologize for fighting off a bully.

It's my fault for bringing it to all chat. I'll admit that. But this system is don fucked. What thin-skinned kids. Grow some.

replies.body: Then don't complain when you catch punishments, congrats on your moral victory at least
Not really a moral victory. My post doesn't really change anything on paper. I just want my position to be heard. Like a third-party voter on election day. Lmao.

I know you guys love reading chat logs. Sure I could probably get slapped with a chat ban, I agree. But again, you guys won't be able to sway my stance on zero-tolerance penalization. It's really silly. They were way more detrimental to the game. Too bad intentionally gimping your team is not punishable, only chat.

> [{quoted}](name=Furious Delisha,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEkIA9Yg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-04T05:25:47.649+0000)
>
> I know you guys love reading chat logs. Sure I could probably get slapped with a chat ban, I agree. But again, you guys won't be able to sway my stance on zero-tolerance penalization. It's really silly. They were way more detrimental to the game. Too bad intentionally gimping your team is not punishable, only chat.

First off, calling people who disagree with you "thin skinned kids who need go grow some" is a very poor way to garner support for your case, especially when it's poor behavior like that that got you punished in the first place (i.e. the behavior you displayed in game 1).

Second off, trolls and inters do get banned but because they're getting smarter about how they avoid detection (and because Riot wants to try to avoid punishing innocent players as much as possible) it's harder to catch them in the act compared to simple chat-related offenses. Gameplay related offenses when proven to be on purpose are assigned a 2-week ban as the first punishment. In case you don’t believe me on this point [here]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/KHAL90oW-stuck-at-honor-zero?comment=0003) [are]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/E4LnThmW-most-ridiculous-chat-restriction-i-have-ever-seen-in-my-life?comment=0011) [a](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/3jEVVlsY-permanently-banned-with-ingame-log?comment=003e) [couple]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/jFwTE8Oj-playing-off-meta-in-ranked-int-feeding-ban?comment=0039) [examples](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/sU5wOfFJ-proof-that-the-automated-system-is-broken?show=rundown) [of](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/GrmPK5yP-intentional-feeding-but-i-didnt-feed?comment=0006) [gameplay](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/MKBQUoKd-banned-for-intentionally-feeding) trolls being banned. Yes it’s just a few examples, but it proves that they do get punished.

Third off, other people behaving poorly does not give you a free pass to do the same (in other words the "they started it" excuse doesn't work here). You're not "defending yourself" by retaliating back, you're just being a jerk. Either respond back in a non-toxic manner or just mute them without responding back to them when it's clear they have nothing helpful or constructive to say.
I`m not sure why game 2 was listed as a reason, maybe because you called someone blind...but then how would they see it?

it's really more like if a kid had the option to block all attacks (muting) but chose to punch the other person along with 2-3 other people.  because when you flame it negatively impacts ALL of your team not just the person(s) you attack.  it demoralizes your whole team and you're also making the person who you attack type more and focus less on WINNING, which again impacts all of your team mates who came to have fun and win, because now your team doesn't have just 1 person who isn't playing their best and is being obnoxious, they have 2.

everything you do is effecting the people around you.  

and I'm no honorable player, I've gotten multiple accounts perma banned. but not anymore,     If you want some advice on getting people to lash out more so there is a higher chance of them getting punished without you being toxic, tell them GJ after each death, if they say kIys just say "are u telling me to kiss myself?" or just ask them what they mean by something, so they can repeat it or get angered and type more outlandish things

you really don't need to call someone things to offend them, every time they die, make a mistake just congratulate them {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Why are you talking in chat so much? Focus on the game? Don't complain about a punishment when it's well persevered. Rules are Rules regardless if you like them.
